title: Again, Blood Moon Diana's Mask
body: I saw many people were talking about removing Diana's mask, and I agree with those comments. I have a suggestion that maybe making Diana wearing her Mask during her W, I think that would be a very awesome effect. By that, the price of the skin can be higher, and I'm that sure people also willing to pay more. {{champion:131}}

replies.body:
The skin is coming to the live-servers in a few days,so now its too late to change it.

Also they couldn't just increase the price for the mask-switch,as the next price tier is 1820,which is used for legendary skins and just a small mask-switching isn't enough to make it legendary.
also can Diana players ever be happy with a skin? even if it doesn't fill their perfect waifu bestgirl quota?
Skin is shipping this week so no changes are gonna be made.

Hi! I'd commented about this in a few posts the other week, but wanted to clarify here as well that we don't have plans to make additional changes to the skin, which means we aren't adding a /toggle feature for the mask.
